item.title: Website Launched!
item.description: Launch! Welcome to regen.lol, a post-codex cracking group that has a couple goals We will deliver standalone cracks that can be applied to clean steam releases We will provide a desktop client for easy install and discovery of our cracked games Our cracks will always be delivered primarily via torrent Our cracks will never tamper with any files not directly related to cracking the game Someday there will be a forum Prepare for stuff coming soon…
